tool_description: API for interacting with web3 apps. Get Uniswap quotes, Token Info, Gas Prices and More.
name: DeepShifter
title: DeepShifter

api_list.name: Wallet Balance
api_list.description: This function returns the current wallet balance for a given address. The value returned is represented in ETH so to get the raw value multiply the returned value by 18.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://deepshifter.p.rapidapi.com/walletBalance/0x41b309236C87b1bc6FA8Eb865833E44158Fa991a"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deepshifter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://deepshifter.p.rapidapi.com/walletBalance/{walletaddress}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deepshifter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Current Block
api_list.description: This function returns the current block number for the ethereal mainnet.

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deepshifter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Gas Price
api_list.description: This returns the current average ethereal network gas price.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://deepshifter.p.rapidapi.com/gasPrice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deepshifter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Uniswap Quote
api_list.description: Send the contract address of the token you want to swap and the contract address of the token you want to receive and get a live quote directly from the Uniswap V2 and V3 pools.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://deepshifter.p.rapidapi.com/0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2/0xA0b86991c6218b36c1d19D4a2e9Eb0cE3606eB48/3000/0/1.75"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deepshifter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://deepshifter.p.rapidapi.com/{tokenin}/{tokenout}/{fee}/{sqrtpricelimitx96}/{amountin}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deepshifter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
